create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts spiritual rap visual
Primary request: Payoff montage uniting Haridwar, Rishikesh Lakshman Jhula, and Ganga Aarti.
Scene/background: montage transitions across Haridwar ghats, Lakshman Jhula bridge, and Ganga Aarti river lights
Subject: river flow motif connecting all three locations
Action: 0-4s Haridwar to bridge transition; 4-8s bridge to aarti transition; 8-12s uplifting wide finale over Ganga
Camera: vertical cinematic crane-up and beat-timed hard cuts
Lighting/mood: dawn-to-night gradient mood
Color palette: gold, cyan, midnight blue, saffron
Style/format: contemporary high-energy shorts style, cinematic realism, no text overlays
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no branded text, no identifiable real people, no copyrighted characters
Avoid: flicker, text artifacts, logos, watermark, deformed faces
